name: @zed-industries/agent-client-protocol
description: The Agent Client Protocol (ACP) is a protocol that standardizes communication between *code editors* (interactive programs for viewing and editing source code) and *coding agents* (programs that use generative AI to autonomously modify code).
author: Zed Industries

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist typescript/*.js typescript/*.d.ts typescript/*.js.map tsconfig.tsbuildinfo && cargo clean
scripts.generate: npm run generate:json-schema && npm run generate:ts-schema && prettier --write typescript/*.ts schema/*
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run build && npm run test
